list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who habitually seeks to harm or intimidate those whom they perceive as vulnerable.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he is a ranting, domineering bully
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy là một kẻ bắt nạt, độc đoán độc đoán

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of starting play in field hockey, in which two opponents strike each other's sticks three times and then go for the ball.
seek to harm, intimidate, or coerce (someone perceived as vulnerable).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her 11- year-old son has been constantly bullied at school
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con trai 11 tuổi của cô đã liên tục bị bắt nạt ở trường

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in field hockey) start play with a bully.
